name: Farout
description:
Farout is a sandbox-adventure game, that is inspired by the popular Minecraft. Originally a short tech demo to feature procedural generation, it evolved into a survival game that allows you to survive in a world filled with wild animals, zombies, and the temperature

In Farout, there are multiple environments, each with an average temperature. You should watch out for the temperature, because when your too cold, you will freeze to death, and if it's too hot, your burn to death. Staying in the shadows, crafting a Torch, Ice Torch, and other items allows to maintain your temperature.

You'll also need to worry about your hunger, as you'll die from starvation. Luckily, you live in a world where Cows, Pigs, and Wolves live. Hunting them with Axes, Swords, Machetes, Bows, gives you meat. You can also cook meat to give you more hunger points back.

At night, it's very dark, maybe too cold, but also Zombie animals will spawn in. Becareful of these, as they are immediately hostile!!! They'll kill you if you're not careful enough....

You'll discover new things to make as you play the game, and each world is randomly generated!!! So you'll be able to play again, again, and again.

Can you survive in Farout? Play to find out!!
